        ghost_scared - The sprite for frightened Ghost

        path - The traversable path
        player_g - The player object in the game
        other_ghosts - The other ghost objects in the game
        frightenedLength - The length of being frightened for the Ghost
        sodaLength - The length of being affected by soda for the Ghost
